metadata.title: CVE-2017-0360 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: file_open in Tryton 3.x and 4.x through 4.2.2 allows remote authenticatedusers with certain permissions to read arbitrary files via a "same rootname but with a suffix" attack. NOTE: This vulnerability exists because ofan incomplete fix for CVE-2016-1242.

criterions.comment: tryton-server package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
